title: Dark Magick
description: I loved Cal. I trusted him. He taught me about Wicca. He helped me find out who I am. Then I met Hunter. He warned me that Cal is dangerous... evil. Now I must find out the truth. If Hunter is right, we are all in great danger.Morgan knows now she is a blood witch. But she doesn't know who or what to trust - except her magick.
author: Cate Tiernan
